name: Archicad Solo Project
summary: Learn about .PLN files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
Microsoft Flight Simulator X Steam Edition

content: GRAPHISOFT Archicad is a building information modeling (BIM) program architects use to design building structures, interiors, exteriors, and landscapes. It includes many capabilities for designing, modeling, and collaborating.

PLN is the native format for Archicad projects. When you save a project as a PLN file, Archicad creates a PLN file to store the project contents. After saving the project, you can close it and re-open it to edit it further.

To create a PLN file, select File → New, modify the project, and select File → Save or Save as.... The software also allows you to save projects as .PLA archives, .BPN backup projects, and TPL project templates.
NOTE: Archicad only supports projects saved by version 8.1 or later of Archicad.

description: A PLN file is a solo project that contains a 3D model created with GRAPHISOFT Archicad architectural designing software. It stores all model data and views generated by Archicad for the project in a native format. PLN projects also contain default settings and library references.

instructions: You can only open PLN files with GRAPHISOFT Archicad in Windows and macOS. To open a PLN file, select File → Open.
GRAPHISOFT Archicad can convert PLN files to various file types, including the following formats:
